trans-unit.source: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.
trans-unit.target: Representerer sikkerhetsinformasjon for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler, inkludert rollemedlemskap.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal object implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Det objektet RolePrincipal implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>grensesnittet og representerer den gjeldende sikkerhetskonteksten for HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: When role management is enabled (see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>), the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assigns a RolePrincipal object to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Når rollebehandling er aktivert (se <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>), <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>tilordner en objektet RolePrincipal <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership.
trans-unit.target: Klassen RolePrincipal viser sikkerhets-ID for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler og i tillegg utfører kontroller rollemedlemskap.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`, then the RolePrincipal object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>er `true`, i objektet RolePrincipal administrerer bufrede listen over roller, og slår opp Rollemedlemskap for den gjeldende brukeren i bufret Vis først deretter rollen <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `false`, the RolePrincipal object always looks up role membership using the role provider.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>er `false`, i objektet RolePrincipal slår alltid opp ved hjelp av leverandøren for rollen medlemskap i rollen.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A> based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det objektet RolePrincipal krypterer og dekrypterer informasjon om bufret i informasjonskapselen ble identifisert av <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>basert på <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Starter en objekt for den angitte identity .

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren RolePrincipal-overlasten oppretter en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt og initialiserer egenskapsverdiene.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Cached role information is not read from the cookie identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bufret informasjon om ikke lese fra informasjonskapselen ble identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of the default role provider.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>for rollen standardleverandøren.</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du aktiverer rollebehandling i <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: Brukeridentiteten til å opprette den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> for.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> class using information that is contained in the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object and using the specified streaming context.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> klasse med informasjon som finnes i det angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt og ved å bruke den angitte direkteavspilling konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity with role information from the specified encryptedTicket.
trans-unit.target: Starter en objekt for den angitte identity med rolleinformasjon fra den angitte encryptedTicket .

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren RolePrincipal-overlasten oppretter en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt og initialiserer egenskapsverdiene.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Role information for the current user is read from the supplied `encryptedTicket` and cached with the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om for gjeldende bruker er lest fra den angitte `encryptedTicket` og bufrede med den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of the default role provider.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>for rollen standardleverandøren.</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du aktiverer rollebehandling i <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: Brukeridentiteten til å opprette den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> for.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains encrypted role information.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder krypterte rolleinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- encryptedTicket is .
trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedTicket is .

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity using the specified providerName.
trans-unit.target: Starter en objekt for den angitte identity ved hjelp av den angitte providerName .

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren RolePrincipal-overlasten oppretter en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt og initialiserer egenskapsverdiene.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `providerName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdien angitt i den `providerName` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du aktiverer rollebehandling i <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider for the user.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på rolleleverandør for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: Brukeridentiteten til å opprette den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> for.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: providerName is .
trans-unit.target: providerNameis .

trans-unit.source: -or- providerName refers to a role provider that does not exist in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: - eller - providerName refererer til en rolleleverandør ikke finnes i konfigurasjonen for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity using the specified providerName and role information from the specified encryptedTicket.
trans-unit.target: Starter en objekt for den angitte identity ved hjelp av den angitte providerName og rolleinformasjon fra den angitte encryptedTicket .

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: Denne overbelastning av den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren oppretter en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt og initialiserer egenskapsverdiene.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Role information for the current user is read from the supplied `encryptedTicket` and cached with the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om for gjeldende bruker er lest fra den angitte `encryptedTicket` og bufrede med den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `providerName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdien angitt i den `providerName` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du aktiverer rollebehandling i <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider for the user.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på rolleleverandør for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: Brukeridentiteten til å opprette den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> for.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains encrypted role information.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder krypterte rolleinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- encryptedTicket is .
trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedTicket is .

trans-unit.source: providerName is .
trans-unit.target: providerNameis .

trans-unit.source: -or- providerName refers to a role provider that does not exist in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: - eller - providerName refererer til en rolleleverandør ikke finnes i konfigurasjonen for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of role names cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen over rollenavn bufret med den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> objektet er endret.

trans-unit.source: The CachedListChanged property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> and added to the cache by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A> method, or when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method being added to the cache.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CachedListChanged tilbakestiller `true` etter role-navn er hentet fra standardrollen <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>og legges til i hurtigbufferen av den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A>metode, eller når den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metodekall den <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>metode for rollen standardleverandøren og mottar svar på `true`, havner role-navn som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metoden blir lagt til i hurtigbufferen.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CachedListChanged property will also return true if <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> has passed, resulting in a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> being set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CachedListChanged også returnerer true Hvis <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>er utløpt, noe som førte til en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>angis.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list of role names cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis listen over rollenavn bufret med den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> objektet har blitt endret; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for the cached role names cookie.
trans-unit.target: Henter banen for bufrede rollen navn på informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: The CookiePath property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CookiePath returnerer verdien for den `cookiePath` attributtet fra filen Web.config for ASP.NET-programmet.

trans-unit.source: For more information on cookie paths, see <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om baner, kan du se <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>.</xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the cookie where role names are cached.
trans-unit.target: Banen til informasjonskapselen der rollenavn bufres.

trans-unit.source: The default is /.
trans-unit.target: Standard /.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the roles cookie has expired.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om roller informasjonskapselen er utløpt.

trans-unit.source: The Expired property returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether the roles cookie has expired based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> and the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer de utløpte en `Boolean` verdi som angir om roller informasjonskapselen er utløpt basert på den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>og til gjeldende dato og klokkeslett.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the roles cookie has expired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis roller informasjonskapselen er utløpt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time when the roles cookie will expire.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet når roller informasjonskapselen utløper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value when the roles cookie will expire.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DateTime>verdi når roller informasjonskapselen utløper.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data that is required in order to serialize the target object using the specified streaming context.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med dataene som kreves for å serialisere målobjektet ved hjelp av den angitte av konteksten.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of roles that the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over roller som den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> er medlem av.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>, then the GetRoles method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>er `true` og rollenavn hurtigbufferen for brukeren som er representert av den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>, og metoden GetRoles tilbakestiller listen over role-navn i hurtigbufferen som brukeren er medlem av.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If role names have not been cached, then the GetRoles method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke bufret role-navn, returnerer metoden GetRoles listen over role-navn som brukeren er medlem av fra standardrollen <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only role names for the current <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> are returned.
trans-unit.target: Bare rollenavn for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>returneres.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether role names have been cached in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object, check the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut om role-navn er bufret i den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objektet, se den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The list of roles that the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Listen over roller som den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> er medlem av.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter sikkerhets-ID for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The Identity of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object is set when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: Identiteten til en <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt angis når den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>konstruktøren kalles.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The security identity for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhets-ID for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om brukeren som representerer den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> er i den angitte rollen.

trans-unit.source: IsInRole first checks the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available.
trans-unit.target: IsInRole kontrollerer den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>til å fastslå om en bufret liste over role-navn for den gjeldende brukeren er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>egenskapen `true`, listen bufrede kontrolleres for den angitte rollen.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the IsInRole method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsInRole finner den angitte rollen i listen bufrede, returneres `true`.

trans-unit.source: If IsInRole does not find the specified role, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method of the default <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsInRole ikke finner den angitte rollen, kaller den <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>-metoden til standard <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>forekomsten du vil finne ut om brukernavnet er knyttet til en rolle fra datakilden for den konfigurerte <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role to search for.
trans-unit.target: Rollen til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>brukeren som er representert av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> er i den angitte rollen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen roller for brukeren er bufret i en informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `cacheRolesInCookie` attributt i Web.config-filen for programmet er satt til `true`, og deretter en liste over role-navn for den gjeldende brukeren skrives til en informasjonskapsel når brukeren medlemskap i en bestemt rolle er merket.

trans-unit.source: The IsRoleListCached property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsRoleListCached angir om role-navn er skrevet til informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the IsRoleListCached property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at, selv om den `cacheRolesInCookie` konfigurasjonsattributtet kan være `true`, returnerer ikke egenskapen IsRoleListCached `true` før etter informasjon om er skrevet til informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: If no role checks are performed for a user, IsRoleListCached will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollerer ingen rolle utføres for en bruker, IsRoleListCached tilbakestiller `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rollenavn bufres i en informasjonskapsel. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the roles cookie was issued.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet som roller informasjonskapselen ble utstedt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that the roles cookie was issued.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DateTime>som roller informasjonskapselen ble utstedt.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på rolleleverandør som lagrer og henter informasjon om for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderName property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ProviderName viser navnet på rolleleverandør som administrerer role-informasjon for brukeren som er representert av den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å få tilgang til bestemte rolleleverandør forekomsten for en bruker ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>klassen uansett om leverandøren er standardleverandøren for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you may create a method that takes a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel opprette en metode som tar en <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>som inndata, og returnerer listen roller for den representeres brukeren.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method of the role provider from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> collection that is indexed by the ProviderName property value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sikre at den riktige rolleleverandør brukes til å returnere listen roller for den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>-metoden til rolleleverandør fra den <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>samlingen som er indeksert av ProviderName egenskapsverdien.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: To populate the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for each request, you must use a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.
trans-unit.target: Til å fylle ut den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objekt for hver forespørsel, må du bruke en <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>hendelsesbehandlingen som er definert i filen Global.asax for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på rolleleverandør som lagrer og henter informasjon om for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Marks the cached role list as having been changed.
trans-unit.target: Merker listen bufrede rollen som har blitt endret.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method marks the cached role list as having been changed by setting <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A> to `true` and <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetDirty merker listen bufrede rollen som har blitt endret ved å angi <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A>til `true` og <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>til `false`.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit-interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Returns the role information cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object encrypted based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den informasjon om bufret med den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> objekt kryptert basert på <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the ToEncryptedTicket method is stored in the roles cookie when <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av metoden ToEncryptedTicket er lagret i roller informasjonskapselen når <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role information cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object encrypted based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Rollen informasjonen bufres med den <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> objekt kryptert basert på <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonsnummeret for informasjonskapselen roller.

trans-unit.source: By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the Version property to distinguish between different formats.
trans-unit.target: Ved å inkludere et versjonsnummer i informasjonskapselen roller, fremtidige versjoner av ASP.NET endre formatet roller informasjonskapselen og bruke egenskapen versjonen til å skille mellom ulike formater.

trans-unit.source: The version number of the roles cookie.
trans-unit.target: Versjonsnummeret roller informasjonskapselen.
